articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by servicepersons of companies under KPA Units 567, 531, 762 and 630 who participated in the 33rd art festival of KPA servicepersons. 
					They put on the stage chorus "Sentinels on the Defence Line a Thousand-ri away Offer Morning Salute to the Supreme Commander," dialogic poem "Love Prevalent at the Post" and  Oungum ensemble "The Blue Sky over My Country" and other colorful numbers of various genres.
					
					The performers enthusiastically sang of the blessed worthy life as soldiers under the loving care of Kim Jong Il and strikingly demonstrated the might of the heroic Korean People's Army which has grown to be an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and its firm faith and will to devotedly safeguard the headquarters of the revolution as a fortress and shield and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms.
					
					As the performance was over, Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the servicepersons on their successful performance.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the servicepersons of the companies staged a splendid performance with numbers distinct in the political stand and perfect in the ideological contents and in artistry and extended high appreciation and thanks to them for their successful presentation. 
					
					All the servicepersons are not only firmly prepared as staunch fighters intensely loyal to the party, the leader, the motherland and the people but have grown to be creators of soldier culture in the era of Songun as they are possessed of a high level of morality and cultural attainment, he noted, adding that the best socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK is invincible as its defence line is guarded by these elite armed forces like an invulnerable iron wall.  
					
					Noting that the 33rd art festival of KPA servicepersons which was held before full houses clearly proved the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy on popularizing the art, he extended a warm salute to all the participants who fully displayed the mental power and collective spirit of the KPA by participating in the festival with great enthusiasm.
					
					The glorious history of our revolution which was started and has advanced with songs proves a great victory of the policy on music as it clearly testified to the might of art, he said, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the popular performing activities which represent one of the important means for boosting the combat capabilities of the units.
					
					Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun,  vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA Generals Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, KPA Col. General Han Tong Gun and other commanding officers of the KPA, and Secretaries of the WPK Central Committee Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and its department directors and first vice department directors and other senior officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Turkmenistan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Turkmenistan President
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov, President of Turkmenistan, on its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop, the message wished the president success in his work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets St. Vincent PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets St. Vincent PM
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Monday sent a message of greetings to Ralph Gonsalves, Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and Grenadines, on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop in the common interests, Kim in the message wished the prime minister success in his work for prosperity of the country and well-being of the people.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Indonesian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Indonesian FM
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message on Oct. 23 to Dr. Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs of Indonesia.
					 Believing that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A Syrian government economic delegation led by Minister of Economy and Commerce Amer Hosni Lutfi arrived here today. A troika delegation of the European Union led by Klas Fredrik Molin, deputy director-general for Political Affairs and head of the Department for Asia and the Pacific of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Sweden, arrived here on Monday to participate in the DPRK-EU political dialogue.

articles.title: Appeal to 70 Million Fellow Countrymen Issued
articles.content:
Appeal to 70 Million Fellow Countrymen Issued
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Religious Believers Council of Korea and the Memorial Commission for Martyr An Jung Gun issued an appeal to the 70 million fellow countrymen today, the centenary (October 26, 1909) of An's shooting to death Hirobumi Ito, the mastermind of aggression who forced the Korean nation into colonial slavery.
					It was a just action against the Japanese imperialist aggressors and a patriotic deed which showed before the whole world that the Korean nation never wants to live as colonial slaves of foreign forces, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					The soul of martyr An Jung Gun calls upon the fellow countrymen to a drive for the independent and peaceful reunification. 
					
					The atrocities the Japanese imperialists committed by trampling down upon the inviolable territory of Korea and imposing the unspeakable misfortune and sufferings upon the Korean nation are touching off bitter resentment among all the fellow countrymen even today though 100 years have passed.
					
					To force the Japanese imperialists to settle all the crimes committed by them in the past is an important task of the Korean nation to defend the independent dignity and honor of the nation with 5000 year-long brilliant history and culture.
					
					It is necessary to resolutely counter Japan's distortion of history and militarist attempt by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					We set the period from Oct. 26, the centenary of the patriotic deed of martyr An Jung Gun, to March 26, 2010, the centenary of his martyrdom, as the "period of anti-Japanese joint struggle in memory of martyr An Jung Gun" and call upon all the fellow countrymen to turn out in the struggle for demanding Japan's apology and reparation.
					
					An dedicated his life to national independence and the independent and peaceful reunified country.
					
					But the Korean nation has not yet put an end to the tragic division forced by foreign forces though more than 60 years have passed since the Japanese imperialists' defeat.
					
					In order to overcome foreign forces' pressure and achieve the cause of reunification, the greatest desire of the Korean nation, it is necessary to strive for national independence and peace and great national unity on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					Let all the fellow countrymen achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity by pooling their will and strength irrespective of differing ideology, ism, political view and religious belief.
					
					Let us achieve national unity and concord on the principle of pulling down the old barrier of distrust and confrontation among fellow countrymen and promoting mutual trust and reconciliation.
					
					No force on earth can bar the fellow countrymen from advancing toward independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					We positively call upon all the fellow countrymen to make joint efforts for national reunification and prosperity under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, recollecting the patriotic deed of martyr An Jung Gun.

articles.title: Solar Cell Street Lamps Donated by China
articles.content:
Solar Cell Street Lamps Donated by China
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Solar cell street lamps were donated by the Chinese embassy here and the Wanxiang Group of China for  the Friendship Tower with due ceremony on Monday on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front and the 50th anniversary of the erection of the tower. 
					 Present there were Kim Jong Sik, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned, Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of his embassy here and the delegation of the group led by Vice-President Han You Hong on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there and the participants looked around the solar cell street lamps.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Young Communist Committee
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Young Communist Committee
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Vladivostok City Committee of the Young Communist League of the Russian Federation.
					It was handed to an official concerned of the DPRK who visited Russia by Anatoli N. Dolgachev, first secretary of the committee, on Oct. 16.

articles.title: Marathon Race of DPRK Championships Held
articles.content:
Marathon Race of DPRK Championships Held
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The marathon race of the DPRK Championships was held in Pyongyang on October 25.
					The race was participated in by more than 160 men and women marathoners from over 30 sports teams in the capital and local areas.
					
					They, who left the Kim Il Sung Stadium, ran a distance of 42 kilometers, via the Arch of Triumph, the Pothong Gate, Chollima Street, the Sunhwagang Bridge and the turn near the boundary between Pyongyang and South Phyongan Province.
					
					Han Yun Chol (male) and Ro Un Ok (female) of the April 25 Sports Team won gold medals in the race.

articles.title: New Book off the Press
articles.content:
New Book off the Press
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Publishing House has recently brought out the biographical book of Songun "General Kim Il Sung, Father of Songun" (Vol. 3).
					 The book deals in detail with the Songun revolutionary feats President Kim Il Sung had performed from July Juche 42 (1953) to the last moments of his life.
					
					 Given in the book are stories that the President brought the postwar rehabilitation and construction and the socialist construction to victory with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership and that he built a powerful socialist country which can crush any military provocations of the imperialist aggression forces by increasing the self-reliant national defence capabilities in every way.
					
					The book also carries historical facts that the President laid a firm guarantee for inheriting the revolutionary cause of Songun and fully established the leadership system of the respected General Secretary Kim Jong Il within the whole army so as to further strengthen and develop the Korean People's Army into an invincible strong army.
					
					 It helps the readers grasp the greatness of the President, father of Songun, and his immortal Songun revolutionary leadership exploits.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- "Glorifying the Long History of the Nation", part 21 of documentary film "The Great History", was produced by the Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio. 
					The film impressively tells through historical sites and relics about the immortal exploits President
						 Kim Il Sung performed by carrying forward and developing the long history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation and adding shine to them in the whole period of leading the revolution and construction. 
					
					The film contains historic scenes showing the President visiting scenic spots such as Moran Hill and Mt.Kumgang together with Anti-Japanese Heroine Kim Jong Suk and General Secretary Kim Jong Il right after the liberation of the country to give instructions on carrying out the work to preserve and manage well historic sites and relics that bear witness to the wisdom and skills of the Korean nation and provide meticulous guidance to it.
					
					The film deals with vivid facts that the President made sure that many issues arising at different historical phases including the clarification of the origin of Koreans, the culture in the areas along the River Taedong, the appearance of Ancient Korea, the first slave state, and the year in which Koguryo was set up were properly settled and led the work to scientifically explain the history of the Korean nation, once distorted and written off. 
					
					 The film tells the touching story that after seeing to it that the ancestral father of the nation was found out, the President  exerted efforts to ensure that King Tangun's Mausoleum, King Tongmyong's Mausoleum and King Wang Kon's Mausoleum were rebuilt as national treasures to be handed down to posterity and showed profound loving care for historians.

articles.title: Pyongyang Musical Instrument Factory
articles.content:
Pyongyang Musical Instrument Factory
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Musical Instrument Factory has been founded and developed under the guidance of the peerlessly great men.
					 In an interview with KCNA Jo Kyu Dok, a manager of the factory, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the State Musical Instrument Manufacturing Research Institute (then) on October 26, Juche 42 (1953) under the difficult conditions of the postwar rehabilitation and construction and gave important instructions for the production of musical instruments on scores of occasions.
					
					 He earmarked precious state fund for providing a solid production base to the factory which had only one belt lathe and some small tools at the time of foundation.
					
					Our factory is now in its new heydays under the warm care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Directing importance to the national musical instruments in the production of musical instruments, he visited the factory several times in 1962 alone to give clear-cut answers to the problems of further developing the traditional national musical instruments in line with the modern aesthetic sense while keeping their unique features and good qualities alive.
					
					 Now our factory manufactures not only lots of national musical instruments such as Kayagum, jotae and jangsaenap but also the peculiar national musical instrument "Okryugum".
					
					 The technicians and workers of the factory reconstructed it on an expansion basis and manufactured a new type of accordion "Unbangul" with their own efforts by giving a full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance during "Arduous March" and forced march when everything was short.
					
					 The "Unbangul" accordion and bayan are popular in foreign countries.

articles.title: Establishment of New International Economic Order Called for
articles.content:
Establishment of New International Economic Order Called for
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- It is essential for social progress and prosperity of developing countries in the new century to remove the old international economic order and establish new and fair one. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 What the imperialists seek is to keep and consolidate the old international economic order and further intensify exploitation and plunder against developing countries and, furthermore, realize their economic domination over the world.
					
					 The establishment of new international economic order on the principle of respect for sovereignty would help ensure relations of mutual respect and equality among countries in the economic field and, moreover, boost economic exchange and cooperation.
					
					 This is also beneficial to guaranteeing developing countries political stability and sustained development.
					
					 The establishment of the said order on the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality will pave a wide avenue for each country and nation to keep steady multifaceted economic development and preserve its characteristics.
					
					 In order to establish the said order, it is necessary for all the countries of the world to establish and maintain equal relations.
					
					 The equal relations promote concord and friendship among countries and nations.
					
					 The Korean people will raise it as the important historic task for the development in the new century to establish the new international economic order on the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality and wage a dynamic struggle to this end and thus contribute to realizing it, the article concludes.

articles.title: All-Embracing Politics, One for Genuine Patriotism
articles.content:
All-Embracing Politics, One for Genuine Patriotism
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The all-embracing politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of genuine love for the country and nation as well as the patriotic one for national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The said politics is characterized by noble human love embracing all the people with loving care and the most magnanimous patriotism closely rallying all the classes and strata of the nation for the common cause of the country and nation.
					
					 The 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation set forth by President Kim Il Sung and the five-point policy for the great national unity put forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il clearly reflected the great all-embracing politics of the WPK for national reunification. So they touched heartstrings of all the Korean compatriots and spurred escalating the movement for national reunification to the nationwide patriotic one.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces in south Korea put a brake on the process for national reconciliation and unity seized by the narrow-minded conception of confrontation, considering the differences in ideology and system as absolute ones. But the DPRK consistently enforced the all-embracing politics with generosity and patience and made unreserved efforts for the great national unity.
					
					 The WPK's all-embracing politics is aimed to rally more people if ever they are patriotic-minded and strengthen the driving force of national reunification in a bid to achieve the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Unshakable is the stand of the DPRK to leniently treat regardless of their past those who betrayed the nation in the past, if they, remorseful of their past wrongdoings, are willing to work for the nation as well as to join hands with anyone willing to turn to patriotism under the banner of great national unity.
					
					 The reality in which the Korean people's cause of national reunification makes dynamic advance under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration overcoming difficulties and trials and all the Koreans turn out as one in the implementation of the inter-Korean declarations clearly proves the validity and vitality of the all-embracing politics enforced by the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Film shows and book and photo exhibitions were held in India, Malaysia, the Czech Republic and Singapore from Oct. 4 to 16 on the occasions of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their immortal party-building leadership exploits and photos on the course covered by the WPK for more than six decades.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "The Ever-victorious Ranks of Parade" and "Reply of Korea".
					
					 The director of a Malaysian company said that the film helped him know well about the secret of the DPRK firmly standing up against the U.S. 
					
					 It was entirely the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung that the army and people of the DPRK could win victory in the Korean war provoked by the U.S., he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean People's Army has grown to be invincible armed forces no formidable enemy can dare provoke thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Unexpected Rest Order
articles.content:
Unexpected Rest Order
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- It was on an early spring day of Juche 27 (1938) when the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army was crossing the Songhuajiang while advancing to the Changbai area on the River Amnok under the command of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A guerilla slipped down a wooden bridge into flowing water to be drenched.
					
					 His clothes were frozen stiff in a moment. However, he hurriedly followed the marching ranks without showing any sign of being cold.
					
					 Informed of this, the President felt his clothes and asked him whether he was injured.
					
					 Listening to his reply that he could march along with the ranks, the President said that then he would be frostbitten, and ordered the unit to have a rest and make a campfire.
					
					 The guerilla, thinking that if he put off his clothes to dry, it would take more time, suggested that he would dry himself in clothes. The President said that if doing so, he would take burns and stripped his clothes off and wrapped him with a blanket. 
					
					 The President's rest order for his man in wet clothes is a token of many stories reflecting his paternal love.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno ciudad de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno ciudad de Huichon
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno la labor de varios sectores de la ciudad de Huichon.
					El Dirigente estuvo primero en el Complejo Electrico Juventud.
					
					Al ver varios productos electricos en los procesos de la produccion del complejo, hizo conocimiento de detalles del estado de la produccion y evaluo altamente los meritos de la clase obrera de dicha empresa.
					
					Diciendo que el complejo logro gran avance en la elevacion de la calidad de los productos como resultado de haber luchado  tenazmente en acato a la orientacion del partido sobre la revolucion tecnica y subrayo que la experiencia de esta fabrica prueba la verdad de que la mayor reserva del aumento de la produccion reside en el progreso tecnico.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrio la biblioteca construida nuevamente por el complejo y presento las tareas que se le presentan.
					
					Terminada la direccion sobre el terreno el Dirigente vio la funcion del grupo de agitacion artistica movil del complejo, aprecio altamente que la clase obrera del complejo desempena magnificamente su papel vanguardista tanto en la materializacion de la linea economica del partido como en la creacion de nueva cultura y se fotografio junto con los innovadores laborales del complejo.  
					
					El Dirigente dirigio sobre el terreno la Hilanderia de Huichon.
					
					Al recorrer varios procesos productivos, se entero detalladamente del estado de los equipos tecnicos y de la produccion y evaluo altamente los exitos laborales de los obreros de la fabrica.
					
					Senalo que  hay que poner en el nivel mundial esta fabrica modernizando mas los procesos productivos y elevando incesantemente la capacidad productiva.
					
					Enfatizo que la hilanderia debe producir mucho el hilo de seda de buena calidad y suministrarlo a las fabricas de telas de seda para llevar a cabo cuanto antes el deseo de toda la vida del Presidente
						Kim Il Sung quien se esforzaba tanto para que el pueblo coreano viviera en las casas de tejas comiendo el arroz cocido y la sopa de carne y vistiendose de la ropa de seda.
					
					El Dirigente estuvo en la Universidad de Tecnologia de Huichon.
					
					Despues de escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano del plantel docente, recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial y dijo que seran eternas junto con la historia de la universidad las inmortales proezas revolucionarias del Presidente acumuladas en el desarrollo de la educacion autoctona.
					
					Al enterarse en detalles del estado de la labor docente y de la investigacion cientifica del citado plantel, el Dirigente aprecio altamente los exitos de los profesores y empleados logrados en la formacion del personal cientifico y tecnico y en la investigacion cientifica.
					
					Puesto que en pleno acato a la politica del partido en materia de la educacion, la universidad ha venido elevando incesantemente el nivel cualitativo de la ensenanza, muchos graduados de este lugar desempenan el papel vertebral en solucionar muchos problemas cientificos y tecnicos que se presentan en varios dominios de la economia nacional y explorar nuevos dominios cientificos y tecnicos, dijo y evaluo  altamente las proezas de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes del plantel acumuladas ante el partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Enseno que la universidad debe formar mayor numero del personal tecnico capaz de contribuir activamente a consolidar con mas firmeza la base de nuestra economia nacional independiente y desplegar al maximo su potencialidad.
					
					Agrego que el plantel debe explorar ampliamente los nuevos dominios cientificos y tecnicos y contribuir activamente a desarrollar de manera trascendental las ciencias y tecnicas de nuestro pais en su conjunto.
					
					Los cambios orgullosos en la provincia de Jagang devienen la clara demostracion de la firme voluntad de nuestro pueblo dispuesto a levantar a toda costa con nuestras fuerzas y nuestros recursos la gran potencia prospera sobre esta tierra.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Pak To Chun, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC; Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il, primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la zona de recreo del monte Myohyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la zona de recreo del monte Myohyang
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la nuevamente acondicionada Zona de Recreo del Monte Myohyang. 
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, recorrio durante varias horas la larga ruta de visita desde la entrada de Habiro hasta el valle Manphok enterandose en detalles de la construccion de la zona de recreo. 
					
					Al ver las rutas de recorrido, los miradores, los sitios de descanso y el viaducto, construidos en perfecta armonia con la belleza de la naturaleza, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los miembros de la brigada juvenil de trabajo hayan acondicionado el monte Myohyang como magnifico destino de diversiones del pueblo. 
					
					Es muy peculiar el diseno de todas las edificaciones, incluso el viaducto ligero que da la sensacion de estar en medio del cielo, y la construccion se llevo a cabo en el maximo nivel cualitativo, dijo.
					
					Calificando de milagro digno de admiracion el hecho de que los trabajadores de la provincia (de Phyong-an del Norte) hayan terminado con las fuerzas propias esa magnifica creacion en el corto periodo de un semestre, aprecio altamente los meritos de los constructores y les expreso agradecimiento. 
					
					El mejor acondicionamiento de la zona de recreo del monte Myohyang como creacion de eterna duracion permitira a nuestro pueblo tomar a sus anchas un descanso cultural en este monte de fama mundial, dijo y agrego que se transmitiran eternamente junto con la historia de construccion de una gran potencia prospera los orgullosos meritos de los constructores quienes contribuyeron a la felicidad del pueblo y a la prosperidad del pais dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion. 
					
					Este ano, -continuo- en que acontecen grandes sucesos y todo nos va bien, se registran sucesivamente en todos los sectores los acontecimientos victoriosos que nos llenan de alegria y jubilo.
					
					Esto es la realidad enorgullecedora de nuestra patria en apogeo que esta a punto de abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera, recalco en tono orgulloso.
					
					Hay que engalanar mejor el monte Myohyang, valioso punto de disfrute del pueblo, para legarlo a las generaciones venideras, asevero y presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la construccion y gestion de la zona de recreo. 
					
					Hay que elevar la tasa de operacion de las instalaciones de servicios publicos ya preparadas y al mismo tiempo, construir otras mas para cubrir la creciente demanda, de modo que mayor numero de visitantes puedan tener un alegre descanso cultural disfrutando a sus anchas del paisaje montanoso de aqui, enseno.
					
					Es importante pavimentar bien las carreteras de recorrido para que los visitantes puedan acceder a todos los puntos famosos, destaco y subrayo la necesidad de concentrar las fuerzas en la culminacion de esa obra. 
					
					Lo mas importante en la administracion de la zona de recreo es proteger el ambiente natural, apunto y anadio que para este fin, hay que conservar en estado original todas las piedras y arboles, en particular, tomar medidas consecuentes para prevenir la contaminacion medioambiental.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Phyong Hae, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, secretarios del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea.

articles.title: CEC y CM para martir An Jung Gun emiten llamamiento
articles.content:
CEC y CM para martir An Jung Gun emiten llamamiento
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Consejo Ecumenico de Corea (CEC) y la Comision Memorial para el Martir An Jung Gun enviaron este lunes a 70 millones de coreanos un llamamiento con motivo de cumplirse 100 anos desde cuando el martir An Jung Gun ejecuto el 26 de octubre de 1909 a Ito Hirobumi, caudillo de la agresion que impuso a la nacion coreana el destino del esclavo colonial.
					El documento senala que este comportamiento de An fue el castigo justo a los agresores imperialistas japoneses y el acto patriotico que demostro a todo el mundo que la nacion coreana no desea nunca vivir como esclavo colonial de las fuerzas foraneas y prosigue:
					
					Hoy, el espiritu de An llama a los coreanos a la lucha por lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica.
					
					Las atrocidades de los imperialistas japoneses que pisotearon la sagrada tierra patria e impusieron inauditas desgracias y sufrimientos a la nacion coreana, provocan la colera de ella hasta hoy a los cien anos.
					
					La liquidacion cabal de los crimenes cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas nipones deviene la importante tarea nacional para defender la dignidad independiente y el honor de la nacion coreana que tiene la historia de cinco milenios y la cultura resplandeciente.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debe enfrentarse rotundamente con las fuerzas unidas con la tergiversacion de la historia y el intento militarista de Japon.
					
					Definimos como el "periodo de lucha comun antijaponesa en memoria del martir An Jung Gun" desde el 26 cuando se cumple el centenario del acto patriotico del martir An Jung Gun hasta el 26 de marzo de 2010 cuando se cumplira el centenario de su muerte por la patria y exhortamos a todos los coreanos a levantarse en la lucha por demandar urgentemente la disculpa y la indemnizacion a Japon.
					
					El martir An sacrifico por si mismo su vida por la independencia nacional y por la patria reunificada de manera independiente y por via pacifica.
					
					Pero, la nacion coreana no puso fin a la tragedia de la division impuesta por las fuerzas extranjeras hasta ahora a mas de 60 anos que datan de la derrota del imperialismo japones.
					
					Para superar la presion de las fuerzas foraneas y realizar la causa de la reunificacion, maximo deseo de la nacion coreana, es preciso hacer esfuerzos por alcanzar la independencia, la paz y la gran unidad de la nacion a base de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Logremos la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con la voluntad y las fuerzas de la nacion por encima de las diferencias de ideologias, ideales, criterios politicos y creencias  religiosas.
					
					Derribemos la muralla vieja de la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre los connacionales y logremos la unidad y la armonia de la nacion en el principio de promover la confianza y la reconciliacion entre si.
					
					No hay en este mundo la fuerza que pueda frenar el avance de la nacion coreana hacia la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Llamamos activamente a todos los coreanos a recordar el acto patriotico del martir An y a esforzarse juntos por la reunificacion y la prosperidad de la nacion enarbolando la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda establecer nuevo orden economico internacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda establecer nuevo orden economico internacional
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- El establecimiento de un nuevo e imparcial orden economico internacional acabando con el viejo deviene en el nuevo siglo el requisito sine qua non del progreso social y prosperidad de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 26 y continua:
					
					 Los imperialistas intentan consolidar el viejo orden economico internacional a fin de recrudecer la explotacion y el saqueo sobre los paises en vias de desarrollo y dominar a la larga el mundo entero en el plano economico.
					
					Si se establece el nuevo orden economico en el principio de respeto a la soberania, seran aseguradas las relaciones de respeto mutuo e igualdad entre los paises en el dominio economico y se dinamizaran el intercambio y la cooperacion de la rama.
					
					Ademas, eso conviene a la estabilidad politica de los paises subdesarrollados y a su desarrollo sostenido y dejara bien abiertas las posibilidades de promover activamente el desarrollo economico multilateral y mantener las caracteristicas de cada pais y nacion.
					
					A fin de lograr el nuevo orden a base de respeto a la soberania, es preciso que todos los paises del mundo establezcan y mantengan las relaciones igualitarias.
					
					 Estas relaciones promueven la reconciliacion y la amistad entre los paises y naciones.
					
					El pueblo coreano contribuira a la implantacion del nuevo orden economico internacional, que este basado en el principio de respeto a la soberania e igualdad, luchando activamente por cumplir esta importante tarea historica para el desarrollo del nuevo siglo.
